subject: svn commit: samba-web r1110 - in trunk: .
body:
Author: jerry
Date: 2007-05-14 13:19:41 +0000 (Mon, 14 May 2007)
New Revision: 1110

WebSVN: http://websvn.samba.org/cgi-bin/viewcvs.cgi?view=rev&root=samba-web&rev=1110

Log:
Fix links to CVE announcements
Modified:
   trunk/index.html


Changeset:
Modified: trunk/index.html
===================================================================
--- trunk/index.html	2007-05-14 13:19:26 UTC (rev 1109)
+++ trunk/index.html	2007-05-14 13:19:41 UTC (rev 1110)
@@ -58,12 +58,12 @@
     Security Fixes included in the Samba 3.0.25 release are:

-      CVE-2007-2444 (Samba 3.0.23d - 3.0.25pre2): Local 
+      CVE-2007-2444 (Samba 3.0.23d - 3.0.25pre2): Local 
           SID/Name translation bug can result in user privilege 
 	  elevation.
-      CVE-2007-2446 (Samba 3.0.0 - 3.0.25rc3): Multiple heap 
+      CVE-2007-2446 (Samba 3.0.0 - 3.0.25rc3): Multiple heap 
           overflows allow remote code execution.
-      CVE-2007-2447 (Samba 3.0.0 - 3.0.25rc3): Unescaped user 
+      CVE-2007-2447 (Samba 3.0.0 - 3.0.25rc3): Unescaped user 
           input parameters are passed as arguments to /bin/sh 
 	  allowing for remote command execution.
